body_html:
@shamoya, there are about 70 million parameters. Here are full logs:
ps.txt,
worker0.txt,
worker1.txt
In this case, worker 1 hanged, but worker 0 didn't. Not sure if the log of worker 1 gives enough information. Let me know if you need me to turn on other logs. Thanks.

body:
@shamoya, there are about 70 million parameters. Here are full logs:
[ps.txt](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/1137272/ps.txt), 
[worker0.txt](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/1137274/worker0.txt), 
[worker1.txt](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/1137275/worker1.txt)
In this case, worker 1 hanged, but worker 0 didn't. Not sure if the log of worker 1 gives enough information. Let me know if you need me to turn on other logs. Thanks.
